pp.description: Tells you a user's (or your own) PP size ;)

sus.description: That user's looking kinda sus, don't you think?

8ball.description: Ask the all-knowing Magic 8 Ball your burning yes/no questions.

no-q-err.title: The Magic 8 Ball needs a question, otherwise it's useless!
no-q-err.description: Maybe add a question and try again?

clap.no-msg-err: Do you just want me to send an empty message? I'd add a message to *clap* if I were you.

owoify.no-msg-err: Come on, you're ruining it by not adding a message to owoify!

fortune.description: It's like opening a fortune cookie, but on Discord, I guess.

wikihow.description: Get a random, out of context image from a random WikiHow article.

minesweeper.description: Play a good ol' game of Minesweeper.

embed.title: New Minesweeper Game
embed.description: Use reactions to choose from the difficulties shown below for this game!

easy.title: 🇦 - Easy
easy.description: This difficulty has a 9x9 grid with 10 mines.

hard.title: 🇧 - Hard
hard.description: This difficulty has a 14x14 grid with 40 mines.

expert.title: 🇨 - Expert
expert.description: This difficulty has a 22x22 grid with 99 mines.

minesweeper.generating: Generating your Minesweeper game... Good luck!
